entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 47 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:52 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:52 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023
